title: Bean and Rice Burritos
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
Salsa, guacamole, or sour cream for serving
instructions: In a skillet, heat some oil over medium heat.
Add the diced onion and bell pepper. Saut√© until they are tender and lightly browned.
Add the black beans, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Stir well to combine and heat through.
Add the cooked rice to the skillet and mix it with the bean mixture until well combined and heated.
Warm the flour tortillas in a separate skillet or in the microwave.
Place a portion of the bean and rice mixture in the center of each tortilla.
Fold the sides of the tortilla over the filling, then roll it up tightly into a burrito shape.
Serve the bean and rice burritos with salsa, guacamole, or sour cream on top.
Enjoy your delicious and affordable meal!
